parameters.functionCode: const items=$input.all();for(const i of items){const ch=i.json.channel_id;const delay=Math.floor(Math.random()*900)+60;i.json.upload_config={channel_id:ch,title:i.json.title,description:i.json.description,tags:i.json.tags||[],scheduled_delay_seconds:delay,proxy_ip:'proxy-'+ch,fingerprint_id:'fp-'+ch+'-'+Date.now()};i.json.binary_noise=Buffer.from(Math.random().toString()).toString('base64').substr(0,16);}return items;
